titles.title: A bill for the relief of Thomas Nelson Flanagan.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House by House Committee on The Judiciary. Report No: 100-438.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

calendar.text: Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.

action.text: Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Biden with amendments. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1099.

vote.text: Passed Senate with amendments by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

vote.text: House Agreed to Senate Amendments by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 2/18/1987--Introduced. Confers jurisdiction upon the United States Claims Court to hear, determine, and render judgment on the claim of a named individual against the United States arising out of his wrongful discharge from the U.S. Naval Reserve.
